title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of giving
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Greenhouse Gas
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Greenhouse Gas 
Emission Reductions, Calculation Methods and Reporting Requirements) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (greenhouse gas emission reduction calculation method reporting requirements) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), and for the purpose of giving
heading: 2. The European Union
text_raw:
2. The European Union 

(Greenhouse Gas Emission Reductions, 
Calculation Methods and Reporting Requirements) Regulations 2017 (S. I. No. 
160 of 2017) are amended – 

(a) by inserting after Regulation 8 the following: 

“Maintenance of lifecycle greenhouse gas reductions 

8A. 
The reduction required to achieved by a supplier by 31 
December 2020 in accordance with Regulation 8 shall be 
maintained by the supplier after that day in each subsequent 
year.”, 

and 

(b) 

in Regulation 17, by inserting after paragraph (5) the following: 

“(6) Where an application has been made by NORA under 
paragraph (1) and the High Court makes a compliance order under 
paragraph (4) but the non–compliance that is the subject of the 
application continues after the making of the order, NORA may 
make a further application under paragraph (1) in respect of that 
further non-compliance in that or any subsequent year.”. 

1 OJ No. L 140, 05.06.2009, p. 88 
2 OJ No. L 350, 28.12.1998, p. 58 
3 OJ No. L 107, 25.04.2015, p. 26 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [670] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 
18 December 2020. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [670]
